response.overview: A film set against the backdrop of East Timorâ€™s integration  into Indonesia. Manuel (Ryan Hidayat), who is pro Fretilin  and continues guerilla activities in the jungle, is in a love  relationship with Ana (Sonia Carrascalao), whose family  opposes Fretilin. This couple is separated by the East Timor conflict between the separatists and the pro-integration forces. An adequate portion of this film is dedicated to the historical background of integration. The film ends with Manuel changing to a pro-integration stance and marrying Ana.
response.title: Langit Kembali Biru
